DHCP_MSG_TYPE_DISCOVER - Static variable in class net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver.DHCPServer
DHCP REQUEST messages are either of type: DISCOVER (0x01) REQUEST (0x03) DECLINE (0x04) RELEASE (0x07) or INFORM (0x08) DHCP REPLY messages are either of type: OFFER (0x02) ACK (0x05) or NACK (0x06)

DHCP_OPCODE_REQUEST - Static variable in class net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver.DHCPServer
DHCP messages are either: REQUEST (client --0x01--> server) or REPLY (server --0x02--> client)
